content:
Ground Einstein Responses with Your Service Data

Use Einstein AI to draft responses from a defined data source with grounding. Grounding indexes your objects and fields so that Einstein knows which information to base recommendations on.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

Service AI Grounding Options
Knowledge Creation: Case - Use case comments and emails to give Einstein details for drafting a Knowledge Article.
Service Replies for Chat: Knowledge - Shows whether replies come from conversation context or knowledge grounding.
Service Replies for Email: Knowledge, Case - Drafted email replies are grounded in your Knowledge base and Case context.

Turn On Service AI Grounding
Ground with Knowledge:
  - Select title, summary, and additional Knowledge fields.
  - Einstein drafts personalized responses using selected knowledge fields.

Ground with Cases:
  - Select subject, description, and additional Case fields.
  - Einstein drafts personalized responses using case details.
title: Grounding Einstein Responses with Service Cloud Data
